com.stormpath.sdk.application

Interface AccountStoreMappingCriteria

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccountStoreMappingOptions<AccountStoreMappingCriteria>, Criteria<AccountStoreMappingCriteria>, Options

    public interface AccountStoreMappingCriteria
extends Criteria<AccountStoreMappingCriteria>, AccountStoreMappingOptions<AccountStoreMappingCriteria>
    An AccountStoreMapping-specific Criteria class, enabling an AccountStoreMapping-specific fluentquery DSL. AccountStoreMappingCriteria instances can be constructed by using the AccountStoreMappings utility class, for example: 
     AccountStoreMappings.where(AccountStoreMappings.listIndex().eq(4))
     .orderByListIndex().descending()
     .withAccountStore()
     .offsetBy(50)
     .limitTo(25));

    Sort Order

    All of the orderBy* methods append an orderBy clause to the query, ensuring the query results reflect a particular sort order.

    The default sort order is always ascending, but can be changed to descending by calling the Criteria.descending() method immediately after the orderBy method call. For example: 

     ...criteria().orderByListIndex().descending()...
    Since:
    0.9

        AccountStoreMappingCriteria orderByListIndex()
        Ensures that the query results are ordered by listIndex.
